articles.author: Alex Kalinauckas
articles.title: Newey’s F1-inspired Red Bull RB17 hypercar revealed at Goodwood - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Final Red Bull creation from Formula 1 design legend Newey makes public bow at Goodwood Festival of Speed, but is still not ready to run
articles.content:
Adrian Newey and Red Bull have unveiled the RB17 hypercar that the famed Formula 1 designer has been producing with the teams Advanced Technologies division.
Revealed in a display at the 2024 Goodwo… [+2560 chars]
